response.projectTitle: Web3 Domain Service Provider Landing Page
response.explanation: This project is a visually stunning, modern landing page for a Web3 domain service provider. Built with Next.js 14 (App Router) and styled with Tailwind CSS, it features a dark, futuristic theme with vibrant accents. The page is fully responsive and includes several sections: a dynamic hero with a domain search, feature highlights with icons, a pricing table, user testimonials, and a final call-to-action. The UI is enhanced with smooth animations, gradients, and reusable components built with best practices, ensuring a professional and engaging user experience. The code is organized into logical components for easy maintenance and scalability.

/components/HeroSection.tsx.code:
import { Button } from "./ui/button"; export default function HeroSection() { return (

Your Identity on the Decentralized Web

Secure your censorship-resistant Web3 domain. Own your digital identity, build decentralized websites, and simplify crypto payments.

Supported TLDs: .eth, .sol, .crypto, and more.

); }

/components/CTASection.tsx.code:
import { Button } from "./ui/button" import Link from 'next/link' export default function CTASection() { return (

Ready to Join the New Internet?

Claim your piece of the decentralized web today. It only takes a few minutes to get started.

) }
